skills.name: Soul Summoning
skills.description: Summons the souls of the dead to attack the enemy 2 - 3 times. Each attack has a 40% chance to decrease the enemy's Attack Speed for 2 turns.

skills.name: Deadly Touch
skills.description: Randomly attacks the enemies several times and weakens the Defense for 2 turns with a 35% chance with each attack and exchanges the decrease attack speed effect with the freezing effect for 1 turn.

skills.description: Gains immunity against inability effects and decreases the chances of receiving Critical Hit by 25%. [Automatic Effect]
